thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 18 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Aldar Properties Signs MoU With Hyperloop TT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aldar Properties Signs MoU With Hyperloop TT
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - ALDAR PROPERTIES:
* SIGNS MOU WITH HYPERLOOP TRANSPORTATION TECHNOLOGIES (HYPERLOOP TT)
* SAYS MOU SIGNED TO BRING FIRST COMMERCIAL HYPERLOOP SYSTEM, HYPERLOOP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT, DEMONSTRATION & VISITOR CENTRE, AND INNOVATION HUB TO ABU DHABI
* MOU WITH HYPERLOOP TT WILL ENABLE DEVELOPMENT OF NEW URBAN CENTRE WITHIN ALDARâ€™S SEIH AL SDEIRAH LANDBANK AND IN CLOSE PROXIMITY TO ALGHADEER
* HYPERLOOP TT FUTURE PLANS INCLUDE CONSTRUCTION OF LINE IN SEVERAL PHASES STARTING WITHIN 10 KM ALLOCATION, WITH FURTHER DEVELOPMENT AIMED AT CREATING COMMERCIAL HYPERLOOP NETWORK ACROSS EMIRATES AND BEYOND Source: ( bit.ly/2H8CQpA ) Further company coverage:
